programme.desc: Three moms from different social circles must work together to plan their kids' elementary school field day.

programme.desc: Natalie and Eric must learn to work together after they both inherit an old, historic bakery. Natalie soon realizes that she has a chance to have it all, a business to call her own, and the true love of her life.

programme.title: Summer in the Vineyard
programme.desc: When Frankie and Nate agree to host an annual celebration, they must make a big splash to ensure the viability of their winery going forward. The paramours will find out if business can be mixed with pleasure.

programme.desc: Abby is a successful executive who's moving to Paris and planning to marry Edward. Life is perfect until she learns her divorce to her high school sweetheart, Luke, is not exactly official.

programme.desc: Erica, an American translator, secretly revises a novel set in Barcelona. Everything is fine until bookstore owner Nico invites the credited author, Anna, to the city for a book-signing.

programme.title: Marry Me in Yosemite
programme.desc: Zoe, a notable photojournalist, visits Yosemite landscapes made famous by Ansel Adams. When she meets Jack, an intriguing tour guide, he opens her eyes to new adventures as they embark on a journey.

programme.title: My Boyfriend's Back: Wedding March 5
programme.desc: A young, ambitious wedding planner partners with Olivia to plan the perfect wedding. What she doesn't know is the groom's best man is none other than her ex-boyfriend, who she hasn't spoken to in five years.

programme.title: Sweet Carolina
programme.desc: A marketing executive reconnects with her high school boyfriend after becoming the unexpected guardian of her niece and nephew.

programme.title: Under the Autumn Moon
programme.desc: While scouting a dude ranch for the outdoor adventure company that employs her, a woman rediscovers her passion for the great outdoors and becomes smitten with the ranch's owner.

programme.title: Betty's Bad Luck in Love
programme.desc: Cursed from childhood to fail at romance, Betty's relationships have always ended in disaster. However, when she meets Alex, she's tempted to try once more.

programme.title: Curious Caterer Mysteries
programme.desc: Caterer Goldy Berry reunites with Detective Tom Schultz to investigate the murder of a realtor. As they uncover personal and professional rivalries, they soon realize the culprit is closer than expected.
